Package pt.ptcris.test

Class Tester

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ptcris.test.Tester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgressHandler

    public class Tester
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProgressHandler
    A simple implementation of the progress handler to log the execution of PTCRISync procedures.
